decentralized event ticketing system where each ticket is an ERC721 NFT","errors":{"ERC721EnumerableForbiddenBatchMint()":[{"details":"Batch mint is not allowed."}],"ERC721IncorrectOwner(address,uint256,address)":[{"details":"Indicates an error related to the ownership over a particular token. Used in transfers.","params":{"owner":"Address of the current owner of a token.","sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred.","tokenId":"Identifier number of a token."}}],"ERC721InsufficientApproval(address,uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `operator`\u2019s approval. Used in transfers.","params":{"operator":"Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.","tokenId":"Identifier number of a token."}}],"ERC721InvalidApprover(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.","params":{"approver":"Address initiating an approval operation."}}],"ERC721InvalidOperator(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `operator` to be approved. Used in approvals.","params":{"operator":"Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner."}}],"ERC721InvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"Indicates that an address can't be an owner. For example, `address(0)` is a forbidden owner in ERC-20. Used in balance queries.","params":{"owner":"Address of the current owner of a token."}}],"ERC721InvalidReceiver(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.","params":{"receiver":"Address to which tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC721InvalidSender(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.","params":{"sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC721NonexistentToken(uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates a `tokenId` whose `owner` is the zero address.","params":{"tokenId":"Identifier number of a token."}}],"ERC721OutOfBoundsIndex(address,uint256)":[{"details":"An `owner`'s token query was out of bounds for `index`. NOTE: The owner being `address(0)` indicates a global out of bounds index."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}]},"events":{"Approval(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token."},"ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool)":{"details":"Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets."},"Transfer(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"Gives permission to `to` to transfer `tokenId` token to another account. The approval is cleared when the token is transferred. Only a single account can be approved at a time, so approving the zero address clears previous approvals. Requirements: - The caller must own the token or be an approved operator. - `tokenId` must exist. Emits an {Approval} event."},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"Returns the number of tokens in ``owner``'s account."},"batchBuyTickets(uint256[],uint256[])":{"details":"Batch buy tickets for multiple events","params":{"eventIds":"Array of event IDs to buy tickets for","quantities":"Array of quantities for each event"}},"batchCreateEvents(string[],uint256[],uint256[])":{"details":"Batch create multiple events","params":{"maxTicketsArray":"Array of maximum tickets for each event","names":"Array of event names","ticketPrices":"Array of ticket prices"}},"buyTicket(uint256)":{"details":"Buy a ticket for a specific event","params":{"eventId":"The ID of the event to buy a ticket for"}},"cancelEvent(uint256,string)":{"details":"Cancel an event and enable refunds (only event organizer can call)","params":{"eventId":"The ID of the event to cancel","reason":"The reason for cancellation"}},"createEnhancedEvent(string,string,string,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,bool,uint256)":{"details":"Create an enhanced event with full metadata and restrictions","params":{"date":"The event date (timestamp)","description":"The event description","maxTickets":"The maximum number of tickets available","maxTicketsPerBuyer":"Maximum tickets one buyer can purchase","name":"The name of the event","ticketPrice":"The price of each ticket in wei","transferFeePercent":"Fee percentage for transfers (0-100)","transfersAllowed":"Whether ticket transfers are allowed","venue":"The venue location"}},"createEvent(string,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Create a new event (only owner can call)","params":{"maxTickets":"The maximum number of tickets available","name":"The name of the event","ticketPrice":"The price of each ticket in wei"}},"eventExists(uint256)":{"details":"Check if an event exists","params":{"eventId":"The ID of the event to check"},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if the event exists"}},"getApproved(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the account approved for `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist."},"getEventDetails(uint256)":{"details":"Get event details","params":{"eventId":"The ID of the event to query"},"returns":{"maxTickets":"Maximum number of tickets","name":"The event name","organizer":"The event organizer address","ticketPrice":"The ticket price","ticketsSold":"Number of tickets sold"}},"getFullEventDetails(uint256)":{"details":"Get comprehensive event information","params":{"eventId":"The ID of the event to query"},"returns":{"date":"Event date","description":"Event description","isActive":"Whether event is active","maxTickets":"Maximum tickets","maxTicketsPerBuyer":"Max tickets per buyer","name":"Event name","organizer":"Event organizer","ticketPrice":"Ticket price","ticketsSold":"Number of tickets sold","transferFeePercent":"Transfer fee percentage","transfersAllowed":"Whether transfers are allowed","venue":"Event venue"}},"getRefundAmount(uint256)":{"details":"Get refund amount for a ticket","params":{"tokenId":"The ticket token ID"},"returns":{"_0":"uint256 The refund amount in wei"}},"getTicketDetails(uint256)":{"details":"Get ticket details including event information","params":{"tokenId":"The ticket token ID"},"returns":{"eventId":"The event ID","eventName":"The event name","owner":"The current ticket owner","ticketPrice":"The ticket price paid"}},"getTicketEventId(uint256)":{"details":"Get event ID for a specific ticket","params":{"tokenId":"The ticket token ID"},"returns":{"_0":"uint256 The event ID associated with the ticket"}},"getTicketsAvailable(uint256)":{"details":"Get tickets available for an event","params":{"eventId":"The ID of the event"},"returns":{"_0":"uint256 Number of tickets still available"}},"getTotalEvents()":{"details":"Get the total number of events created","returns":{"_0":"uint256 The total number of events"}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"Returns if the `operator` is allowed to manage all of the assets of `owner`. See {setApprovalForAll}"},"isEventCancelled(uint256)":{"details":"Check if an event is cancelled","params":{"eventId":"The ID of the event to check"},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if the event is cancelled"}},"isValidForEntry(uint256)":{"details":"Check if a ticket is valid for entry (owned by caller and event exists)","params":{"tokenId":"The ticket token ID"},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if ticket is valid for entry"}},"name()":{"details":"Returns the token collection name."},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the owner of the `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist."},"refundTicket(uint256)":{"details":"Request refund for a ticket after event cancellation","params":{"tokenId":"The ticket token ID to refund"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`, checking first that contract recipients are aware of the ERC-721 protocol to prevent tokens from being forever locked. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must have been allowed to move this token by either {approve} or   {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon   a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon   a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"Approve or remove `operator` as an operator for the caller. Operators can call {transferFrom} or {safeTransferFrom} for any token owned by the caller. Requirements: - The `operator` cannot be the address zero. Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event."},"symbol()":{"details":"Returns the token collection symbol."},"tokenByIndex(uint256)":{"details":"Returns a token ID at a given `index` of all the tokens stored by the contract. Use along with {totalSupply} to enumerate all tokens."},"tokenOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256)":{"details":"Returns a token ID owned by `owner` at a given `index` of its token list. Use along with {balanceOf} to enumerate all of ``owner``'s tokens."},"tokenURI(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for `tokenId` token."},"totalSupply()":{"details":"Returns the total amount of tokens stored by the contract."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. WARNING: Note that the caller is responsible to confirm that the recipient is capable of receiving ERC-721 or else they may be permanently lost. Usage of {safeTransferFrom} prevents loss, though the caller must understand this adds an external call which potentially creates a reentrancy vulnerability. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. Emits a {Transfer} event."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"updateEventSettings(uint256,bool,uint256)":{"details":"Update event settings (only organizer can call)","params":{"eventId":"The event ID to update","transferFeePercent":"Transfer fee percentage (0-100)","transfersAllowed":"Whether transfers are allowed"}},"verifyTicketOwnership(uint256,address)":{"details":"Verify ticket ownership and validity","params":{"owner":"The expected owner address","tokenId":"The ticket token ID"},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if the ticket is valid and owned by the specified address"}}},"title":"VeriTix","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"getTicketEventId(uint256)":{"notice":"This is a simplified version - in production, you'd store eventId per :"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://22e69c975772c1c9c4547c171bad581e4bd0e82b71a684a77a4b33bd233b34cd","dweb:/ipfs/QmeQRDYbT3KNSQkbr5LQodedsUTYW1hdhvgRhzBEst6EMK"]}},"version":1}

approve(address,uint256).details: Gives permission to `to` to transfer `tokenId` token to another account. The approval is cleared when the token is transferred. Only a single account can be approved at a time, so approving the zero address clears previous approvals. Requirements: - The caller must own the token or be an approved operator. - `tokenId` must exist. Emits an {Approval} event.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the number of tokens in ``owner``'s account.

batchBuyTickets(uint256[],uint256[]).details: Batch buy tickets for multiple events

params.eventIds: Array of event IDs to buy tickets for
params.quantities: Array of quantities for each event

params.maxTicketsArray: Array of maximum tickets for each event

buyTicket(uint256).details: Buy a ticket for a specific event

params.eventId: The ID of the event to buy a ticket for

cancelEvent(uint256,string).details: Cancel an event and enable refunds (only event organizer can call)

params.eventId: The ID of the event to cancel

createEnhancedEvent(string,string,string.details: Create an enhanced event with full metadata and restrictions

params.maxTickets: The maximum number of tickets available
params.maxTicketsPerBuyer: Maximum tickets one buyer can purchase
params.name: The name of the event
params.ticketPrice: The price of each ticket in wei

createEvent(string,uint256,uint256).details: Create a new event (only owner can call)

params.maxTickets: The maximum number of tickets available
params.name: The name of the event
params.ticketPrice: The price of each ticket in wei

params.eventId: The ID of the event to check

returns._0: bool True if the event exists

getApproved(uint256).details: Returns the account approved for `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

params.eventId: The ID of the event to query
The ID of the event to query

getRefundAmount(uint256).details: Get refund amount for a ticket

returns._0: uint256 The refund amount in wei

getTicketDetails(uint256).details: Get ticket details including event information

getTicketEventId(uint256).details: Get event ID for a specific ticket

returns._0: uint256 The event ID associated with the ticket

getTicketsAvailable(uint256).details: Get tickets available for an event

returns._0: uint256 Number of tickets still available

getTotalEvents().details: Get the total number of events created

returns._0: uint256 The total number of events

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Returns if the `operator` is allowed to manage all of the assets of `owner`. See {setApprovalForAll}

isEventCancelled(uint256).details: Check if an event is cancelled

params.eventId: The ID of the event to check

returns._0: bool True if the event is cancelled

isValidForEntry(uint256).details: Check if a ticket is valid for entry (owned by caller and event exists)

returns._0: bool True if ticket is valid for entry

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

ownerOf(uint256).details: Returns the owner of the `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

refundTicket(uint256).details: Request refund for a ticket after event cancellation

params.tokenId: The ticket token ID to refund

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`, checking first that contract recipients are aware of the ERC-721 protocol to prevent tokens from being forever locked. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must have been allowed to move this token by either {approve} or   {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon   a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event.

Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon   a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Approve or remove `operator` as an operator for the caller. Operators can call {transferFrom} or {safeTransferFrom} for any token owned by the caller. Requirements: - The `operator` cannot be the address zero. Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event.

tokenByIndex(uint256).details: Returns a token ID at a given `index` of all the tokens stored by the contract. Use along with {totalSupply} to enumerate all tokens.

tokenOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256).details: Returns a token ID owned by `owner` at a given `index` of its token list. Use along with {balanceOf} to enumerate all of ``owner``'s tokens.

tokenURI(uint256).details: Returns the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for `tokenId` token.

totalSupply().details: Returns the total amount of tokens stored by the contract.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. WARNING: Note that the caller is responsible to confirm that the recipient is capable of receiving ERC-721 or else they may be permanently lost. Usage of {safeTransferFrom} prevents loss, though the caller must understand this adds an external call which potentially creates a reentrancy vulnerability. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. Emits a {Transfer} event.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateEventSettings(uint256,bool,uint256.details: Update event settings (only organizer can call)

returns._0: bool True if the ticket is valid and owned by the specified address

getTicketEventId(uint256).notice: This is a simplified version - in production, you'd store eventId per token

refundTicket(uint256).notice: Ticket must be burned after successful refund
